Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Weapon station electrical short. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Targeting System component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 24/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma
